how-will-you-arrive.header: Your new journey to the UK
how-will-you-arrive.question: How will you arrive in the UK?

email-us.header: Email us with your new travel details
email-us.request: Please email electronicvisawaiver@homeoffice.gsi.gov.uk with the new details for your journey to the UK.

by-plane.two: new flight number (if your journey has any stops or connecting flights we only need details of the flight landing in the UK)
by-plane.three: airport this flight takes off from
by-plane.four: new date this flight takes off
by-plane.five: new time this flight takes off
by-plane.seven: new date of arrival in the UK
by-plane.eight: new time of arrival in the UK

by-train.three: new train station you depart for the UK from
by-train.four: new date of departure for the UK
by-train.five: new time of departure for the UK
by-train.seven: new date of arrival in the UK
by-train.eight: new time of arrival in the UK

third-page.header: This page shows how to make a field mandatory depending on the answer to a previous question
